channel.title: Burritos and the Bogans Classcards + Mechanics
channel.description:
[quote="NuclearBurrito, post:87, topic:72232, full:true"] Just do this.
1: Scum have no factional kill 2: Pug DOES know his allies (why wouldn’t he? He needs vote so he doesn’t even care anyways) 3: Players vote people for Prime Minister every day. That person dies that night if they are not Pug or FK 4: After each election Pug can kill someone (or not) he may only do this once per game 5: If Firekitten is elected then town instantly wins. If Pug is elected then scum instantly win. You can vote self. If Firekitten dies then Scum win. If Firekitten is alone with Pug then Town wins 6: Game is flipless [/quote]
:shield: = Unique
## Town
> ## [color=green]Burrito[/color] > You are a Burrito, the species with the highest population in Australia. You dislike Pug after he called you a carrot and now you want Firekitten up for Prime Minister. Only problem is that you cannot identify fellow burritos. > *You win when Firekitten is voted for Prime Minister or when Firekitten is alone with Pug.*
> ## [color=green]NuclearBurrito[/color] :shield: > You are NuclearBurrito. A special Burrito among the crowd as you know exactly who Firekitten is but all good things have a downside as the Bogans can detect your nuclear energy and they know exactly who you are. > *You win when Firekitten is voted for Prime Minister or when Firekitten is alone with Pug.*
> ## [color=green]Firekitten[/color] :shield: > You are Firekitten, the Burrito's choice to usurp the current Prime Minister of Australia. You do not have any defenses due to your lack of money so you must be careful to not die. > *You win if you are voted for Prime Minister or when you are alone with Pug*
## Bogans
> ## [color=red]Bogan[/color] > You are a Bogan, as you have bogan senses ya know who ya fuckin mates are. As the Burritos are campaigning against Pug you still want him in so you have to kill their candidate. Firekitten as he isn't a true blue Aussie. > *You win when Pug is voted for Prime Minister or when Firekitten dies*
> ## [color=red]Pug[/color] :shield: > You are Pug. Your goal is to become the Prime Minister of Australia. For this, you have bogans to help you here. You may kill a player in the game once due to your skills in the 11th crusade. > *You win if you are voted for Prime Minister or when Firekitten is eliminated*
# Neutral > ## [color=cyan]RNGoddess, Celeste[/color] :shield: > You are Celeste. Your goal is to taunt Firekitten and Pug at the end of the game when they both fail their goals. You also know exactly who both of them are as your rng told you. > *You win if neither Pug or Firekitten gain prime minister.*
